website_summaries.verdict: This is a low-priced option for those who need strong, sharp scissors that aren't necessarily the most powerful of all the options.
pros: Users can adjust the tension screws as they see fit
cons: Although marketed as carpet scissors, most users find they work best for materials that are slightly less tough to cut than carpet

customer_reviews.title: These are a poor set of scissors
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing! The first set came, or at least the package came and the scissors were missing. I ordered another pair, So the new scissors came and they were heavy and I thought it finally would be worth the double price but they aren't usable! The sharpening is missing on the first 25% of the blade and they won't cut at all there. The upper section of the blade is OK, but hardly adequate for any project.
customer_reviews.author: Leo R Rancour

customer_reviews.title: Cutting remarks
customer_reviews.text: Oh my! I can't say enough good things about these scissors. I bought them to trim an area rug pad. It took a bit of time but they got the job done without dulling the blade. I use them to cut all sorts of things. I haven't tried them on metal yet but don't plan on it. They are heavy for a pair of scissors but that's because they are well made. These are my go to scissors for just about anything I want to cut. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: MarK

customer_reviews.title: Best heavy duty scissors for the money
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a very good pair of heavy scissors to work with projects around the house. I gave theses Heavy Duty Scissors a shot and surprise !!! they are great !!! I have used them for fabric, cardboard, plastic, etc. and they worked every time. I can not express how satisfied I am with these scissors, I do recommend them to other buyers.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Scissors for those that understand the difference between functionality and craftsmanship!
customer_reviews.text: If you a cultivator of solid equipment and love the weight of a good pair of scissors this is the ones that you want! I collect scissors like others collect favorite towels. I wanted something that would cut everything I needed it to cut without the worry of it breaking. Great on everything.
customer_reviews.author: Zarilla

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: Cut clean and easily on single fold. Had difficulty cutting thru more than one layer of cloth. Overall, did well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s heavy. Not for 3 folding layers of thick cotton materials
customer_reviews.text: It’s heavy and hard to cut cotton material with 3 folding it’s frustrating. Worst choice I made I was looking pure stainless steel scissors so I thought this one good. Looks good and heavy but good sheer fabrics and heavy cotton material
customer_reviews.author: Bubby

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are heavy, and cumbersome, not too smooth opening and closing. Get something else.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Pucci

customer_reviews.title: Dull but nice weight
customer_reviews.text: They are very dull and don’t cut well I was very disappointed in the product. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: So Far Great
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty well built So far cutting great Good size handle finger holes
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t strong enough to cut carpet easily but I’m sure it works for other applications.
customer_reviews.author: Loc Tran

customer_reviews.title: A little Awkward
customer_reviews.text: A little bit awkward for my medium sized female hand
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Runnels

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: This product was supposed to cut carpet which it could not do. My scissors that I bought at the dollar store worked better then these did. very disappointed because now I see that these are not even eligible to be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: great scissors. should last for a long time. prices is good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.text: YEEEEESSS! So love these! All of my cuts are smooth and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product!!
customer_reviews.text: These scissors are awesome, they are exactly how they are described, The weight of the scissors was heavier then what I expected. I'm surprised they don't charge more for them . I was shocked how heavy duty they are!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Super sharp
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to cut 1/8" neoprene material. Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: sunshinemom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality scissors. Very sharp. Be aware they are quite heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Marcin

customer_reviews.title: Worst scissors ever
customer_reviews.text: Right when I took the out of the package, they won't even cut a thin piece of fabric. These scissors are useless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy these
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made. Cheap steel. These are a piece of junk. Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Bob B.

customer_reviews.title: its very bad quality
customer_reviews.text: very bad quality I only work 2 hours with it and it hardly cut anything anymore
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dull edge, does not cut through much of anything.
customer_reviews.text: The cutting edge is dull beyond belief and would not cut through a piece of carpet. I went through it with a bit of difficulty with regular scissors. I ordered these to make it easier on myself and paid for two day shipping. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Buystoomuch

customer_reviews.title: SUPER SHARP and they hold their edge!
customer_reviews.text: Aaaccchh!! I don't know how I got by before I bought these. They're long but that's what I need when cutting fabric, helps cut a much straighter line. These are well-balanced and have a good heft in your hand, aren't gonna slip out. I use them for everything except cutting paper, which of course dulls scissors. I haven't had to sharpen these yet and I've had them for a few months and use them pretty much daily. GOOD BUY!
customer_reviews.author: the Baroness Bruce-Campbell deVermandois

customer_reviews.title: Not for carpet
customer_reviews.text: Not much use for carpet. Would not cut synthetic hair pad for a set of steps. Maybe ok for tailor work, but not recommended for carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Wally

customer_reviews.title: They work.
customer_reviews.text: The work great for me. I am a union sheetmetal worker. I use the them for cutting flexible duct and they cut through the insulation and plastic with ease (still use lineman’s pliers for the wire). I also use them on plastic bags and cardboard a lot with no problems. I had them a few months with plenty of use and they are still as sharp as day one. Other guys I work with have bought the same pair off of here.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Not true stainless steel
customer_reviews.text: To start with they are not true stainless steel ! Stainless is not magnetic ! The other is the quality is poor ! The handle edges are sharp enough to make them very uncomfortable to use !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I feel like Edward Scissorhands with these
customer_reviews.text: got these sheers to cut plants, and not just the THC enriched ones either. Love them for trimming bush and cutting heavy material. Still can't sculpt a unicorn out of my shrubs though
customer_reviews.author: whitey

customer_reviews.title: super heavy duty - these are not sissy scissors - ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow, super heavy duty - these are not sissy scissors - love the sharpness and they are well constructed. However, I will have to order another pair of scissors just a tiny bit smaller, for smaller projects.
customer_reviews.author: GGLO

customer_reviews.title: SUPER HEAVY DUDY!
customer_reviews.text: These things are a weapon! They are so super heavy duty. Even just to pick them up. We use them at work to cut Ortho glass for casts.
customer_reviews.author: mkastner

customer_reviews.title: terrific scissors
customer_reviews.text: I cut a lot of speaker carpet, and these are amazing for it. They are heavy, durable and sharp. If you use scissors a lot these are a great investment.
customer_reviews.author: casey scott

customer_reviews.title: Great scissors,great price.
customer_reviews.text: These scissors are great. They stay sharp and they cut through light plastic, thick cloth, even leather. We’re thinking about buying more pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dual Purpose
customer_reviews.text: They were sharp and comfortable, didn't cramp my hand after hours of use. Bought them to cut rolls of insulation too length on a remodel I was doing, now my wife has added them to her sewing room.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond P. Weaver

customer_reviews.title: ... did not arrive as sharp as I would have liked but it's a very good tool - feels good ...
customer_reviews.text: It did not arrive as sharp as I would have liked but it's a very good tool - feels good in the hand
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Lugo

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My wife found these very useful in her hobby shop.
customer_reviews.author: Stan & Marie McGrath

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A good or better than the one my mother had.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A gift for a friend who is an upholsterer - he was pleased
customer_reviews.author: Howard Weinstein

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t cut carpet as stated. Very uncomfortable to try and cut.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Was able to cut through a thick carpet well
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: ... using this for cutting heavy fabrics and is very useful to my sewing projects
customer_reviews.text: I am using this for cutting heavy fabrics and is very useful to my sewing projects.
customer_reviews.author: Teresita

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good Quality like this is hard to find, basic, rugged, sturdy, good steel.
customer_reviews.author: des

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable and cut great almost as good as wiss
customer_reviews.author: Shanna

customer_reviews.title: REALLY poor quality. You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: REALLY poor quality. You get what you pay for... I really wish Amazon would quit selling junk like this and focus on vetted quality products. Returned for a refund. My bad for trusting other reviews - they must have been cutting tissue paper instead of thick fabric which is what this type of shear is usually designed for.
customer_reviews.author: Zoom Zoom Zoom

customer_reviews.title: Not the carper cutter iw as looking for
customer_reviews.text: It didnt cut carpets as claimed but works fine otherwise
customer_reviews.author: nashafi

customer_reviews.title: Way too heavy and no good grip
customer_reviews.text: VERY heavy. I can't even get a good grip in order to cut burlap. One can get blisters if the cutting job is bigger. Quite uncomfortable for medium size ladies hands.
customer_reviews.author: milena

customer_reviews.title: Rusts first time in dishwasher then had to throw away
customer_reviews.text: Rusts like crazy on every surface first time through a dishwasher. If there is stainless steel in there, there cannot be much in it. Bought it, cut open one plastic food bag, put in dishwasher, took out next day, all rusty, had to throw it away. I call fake product. It does carefully and misleadingly says just “Stainless” on them. But misleading deserves no stars at all.
customer_reviews.author: Roo

product_meta.title: 10 Inch HEAVY DUTY TAILOR SCISSORS CARPET / UPHOLSTERY SHEARS TRS10
feature_bullets: Ideal for Cutting Thread, Upholstery, Leather, Fabrics...
Also cut Cottons, Polyesters, and Suede
